location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire to Francis Warden, Chief Secretary to the Government, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is responding to the commands of the Government of Bombay, dated 17 January 1811, which ordered that the Barbara[ Patamai] should return to Bombay as soon as possible (carrying any intelligence on Persia that can be obtained), and that William Bruce should pay his respects to Sir Gore Ouseley once he arrives aboard the Lion. The letter also notes the extra guard provided for the Barbara due to the 'present state of the Gulf'.
